entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning early this evening except periods of wet snow over higher terrain. Snow level 600 metres. Wind east 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain in the morning and afternoon. Snow level 700 metres. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
